unnormalised: Athlete biographies offer valuable insights. Dr. Sharma's book on Sachin Tendulkar is insightful. We learn about his early days in Mumbai and struggles before his success. Also, PT Usha's story inspires many. Imagine training on a 500 sq ft track! Hopefully, future biographies highlight more Indian athletes. The details regarding endorsement deals (Rs. 50 Lakhs +) & performance in 100m are interesting. Good work.
normalised: Athlete biographies offer valuable insights. Doctor Sharma's book on Sachin Tendulkar is insightful. We learn about his early days in Mumbai and struggles before his success. Also, P T Usha's story inspires many. Imagine training on a five hundred square foot track! Hopefully, future biographies highlight more Indian athletes. The details regarding endorsement deals (rupees fifty lakhs plus) and performance in one hundred meter are interesting. Good work.
